==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|陣|貝}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|陣|貝|lang=ja}}. The ''kai'' reading for {{l|ja|貝}} changes to ''gai'' due to [[rendaku]].

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|じんがい}}

# a [[Triton's trumpet]] (''[[Charonia tritonis]]'') [[shell]] used in ancient times as a [[horn]] to signal troop movements
